name: cloud humans
headline: AI-powered customer service for startups
description:
cloud humans introduces claudIA, every startup's CX super agent.

ClaudIA is a GPT based bot who can answer any customer support tickets with zero tech effort and already integrated with your current flows and systems. 

With ClaudIA, you can automate 55-90% of your customer's enquiries while maintaining the same service level you are proud of. Gain efficiency, scalability and quality today.

Try it free (demo): https://www.cloudhumans.com/us/claudia-demo
Reach out if you have any questions: bruno@cloudhumans.com

founders.name: Ian Kraskoff, Founder
founders.description: In 2015, I became a door-to-door salesperson. Going outside, be it sunny or rainy, I realised how much opportunity was needed for talented people who worked in the front-lines. Before that, I had launched products for the unbanked population in the Americas. After that, I joined Uber Eats to launch it in Brazil, leaving the company as a GM. Most recently, I worked for Loft, a prop tech startup in Brazil, to lead it's the apartment acquisition area in addition to support and BPO.

founders.name: Bruno Cecatto, Founder
founders.description: If you're afraid to fail in a startup, you're destined to do so

Claudia
# Join the fastest-growing startups and scale your support with Claudia
Automate up to 85% of your support tickets without the need for engineering. Claudia is already integrated with your support tools, responding to customer inquiries with personalized data and content. Utilize Artificial Intelligence to run your workflows and processes 24/7.
[Talk to an expert](https://www.cloudhumans.com/<#formulario-ctt>)[Free demo](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/claudia-demo>)
Trusted by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/667d61b8fa8753e12e693da6_en--sprite-desktop.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/667d61d1e672d76c868b94e3_en--sprite-mobile.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666859449ffda623d594569f_artificial-intelligence.svg)
CLAUdia
## ClaudIA drastically reduces your support workload, making your team leaner.
Claudia is a chatbot that communicates like a human using artificial intelligence
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c7ddbc3e24b54e18714f6_ch-i-zap-twotone.svg)
Agility in service
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f1accea225ef6307eaa2b_icon%20time%20enxuto.png)
Scale with a more strategic team.
Watch Claudia handle the most frequent inquiries, freeing your team to focus on more special and sensitive cases.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/66757eb6e2edbe4b943711df_helpdeskEN1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c82c603e9a4bfcf4f4b00_arrow%20connection.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c8d0aa1a0d1d5576a09f3_agilidade.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c824d2333524cadde8b38_ch-i-ai-brain-04.png)
Efficient service
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/66757ede02128f46509af30a_helpdeskEN2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6674d99c735f8274b75fbdaa_icon.svg)
Claudia learns to route more complex cases directly to your team.
Claudia accesses your content, data, and systems to perform the same processes. When necessary, it escalates more complex inquiries directly to your team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c938d405a4574648c84c5_hug.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c824d2333524cadde8b38_ch-i-ai-brain-04.png)
Efficient service
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6666ee638f47adc749d1f3be_icon%20conexao%20privada.png)
Private data connection
Import and customize your support content in just a few clicks. Connect Claudia to any database, enabling it to view and make changes for your customers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c9619a7084aa0a9eda92d_arrow.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c95e26c4f39096db7fe87_helpdesk.svg)
Private data connection
Activate integrations in just one click
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c944be0d3095a12d421ff_tools.svg)
Knowledge bases
Link your content with ClaudIA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/66758be2a5e6fdaf3c5abc48_Bases%20de%20conhecimento.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666c953d6156659984b6ba00_ch-i-checkmark-circle-02.png)
Enhance your service with the tools that your team uses on a daily basis.
[Understand more about the product](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/claudia>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6661d36be4cacb923896c6ca_ch-i-plug-socket.svg)
Integrations
# Use ClaudIA in your helpdesk or on Cloud Humans' complete platform, built with AI first.
[Learn more about the product.](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/claudia>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f2055f27df40262d35df5_circle.png)
[Understand more about the product](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/claudia>)
# Customer experiences
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687e5faffc4960e95e8dac7_nuvemshop.svg)
"65% of our users who interact with ClaudIA don't need to escalate to a human agent. It has been a game-changer for us".
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687ec061b542fd8192fa1b2_Paula%20Saboia.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6686a852c9834c6d9bc122dd_Afya%20iClinic.svg)
“We reduced our hiring budget by 20%. CLAudia operates as a first level and solves more than half of the tickets alone”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687e716e714dff70572babf_AlexFya.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6686a852358bbade049d9135_pier.svg)
“CLAudia reduced 65% of our tickets. It doesn't compare to our previous chabot architecture.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687e7790fa07e263ec21f4e_LaisPIER.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/668db4b5457d630957888777_logozippi.svg)
“We were able to achieve leaner scales. Our team spends more time calibrating Claudia and less time putting out fires.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/668db455d529a8dd436d232c_Dalic%C3%A1ria%20Alonso.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687e9bab45a5104da42c0ff_insider.svg)
“In addition to reducing our ticket load by more than half, CLAudia is one of our best sellers”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687ea201d4ae1461b88d393_Michel%20Insider.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6686a85224eb6157e3e31b6d_diferente.svg)
“Within a week Claudia was already doing the job of 3 agents. It was very easy to implement and impressive to see it evolve.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/6687e7c7f0f5fa6cd2c42930_Victor%20DIFERENTE.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f29661e432b8c35eaebcc_yampi.svg)
"In the first week, we managed to reduce our first response time to customers by over 80% while maintaining a high level of CSAT"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f29a70c348d24cc9b9ad1_Container%20Slider2.png)
[Discover more success stories](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/cases>)
[Talk to an expert](https://www.cloudhumans.com/<#formulario-ctt>)[Free demo](https://www.cloudhumans.com/</us/claudia-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/666863f296f005779b5077b4_ch-i-mail-01.svg)
Talk to us
# Talk to our team and deep dive Claudia's features
Founders of Cloud Humans are available to delve into your company's specifics and demonstrate how Claudia works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f3150526c5450f13e02c7_Aspas.svg)
We created Cloud after struggling with bots that don't work or take ages to implement. If you're looking for a different approach, I'd like to talk to you".
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620c3ba9ea080a332239a65f/665f31de1309e0b9d1543f8b_Ian%20Kraskoff.png)
Ian Kraskoff

generated_description:
### Cloud Humans: Elevating Customer Service with AI

**Founded:** 2020  
**Location:** São Paulo, Brazil  
**Team Size:** 30 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W21  
**Founders:** Ian Kraskoff (CEO) and other co-founders  
**Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell  
**Industry Tags:** Artificial Intelligence, SaaS, Chatbot, Customer Service

#### Mission
Cloud Humans is on a mission to revolutionize customer service for startups through AI-driven solutions. Their flagship product, ClaudIA, is marketed as a customer experience (CX) super agent for startups, leveraging powerful GPT-based technology to handle customer inquiries seamlessly.

#### Product Overview: ClaudIA
ClaudIA isn't your run-of-the-mill chatbot. It’s designed to integrate effortlessly into your existing workflows, allowing businesses to automate between 55% and 90% of customer inquiries. This translates into improved efficiency, scalability, and quality within customer service operations—all without requiring unnecessary technical setups.

ClaudIA can:

- Automate ticket responses, available 24/7.
- Deploy personalized communication based on customer data and history.
- Escalate more complex inquiries to human agents when necessary.
- Connect to various databases and external systems with ease.

This robust system allows your team to focus on high-level tasks, streamlining support operations that can lead to significant cost savings. Imagine a scenario where your support staff spends less time addressing routine questions and more time on strategic initiatives!

#### Performance and Customer Feedback
The feedback from early adopters has been overwhelmingly positive. Many report notable reductions in their ticket volumes—some businesses seeing a cut of over 65%. Users specifically highlight that ClaudIA functions effectively as a first-level support agent, allowing teams to focus on more nuanced customer interactions.

Some impressive testimonials include:

- "ClaudIA reduced our hiring budget by 20%. It handles more than half of the tickets alone."
- "Within a week, ClaudIA was performing the workload of three agents."

#### Get Started
Interested in experiencing the benefits of AI-powered support? You can **try ClaudIA for free** through their demo [here](https://www.cloudhumans.com/us/claudia-demo). Have more questions? Reach out to their team at [bruno@cloudhumans.com](mailto:bruno@cloudhumans.com).

#### Learn More
For more on how ClaudIA can transform your company's customer service, visit their website at [Cloud Humans](https://www.cloudhumans.com).

In a world where customer expectations are soaring, Cloud Humans is positioning itself as a vital ally to startups, enabling smarter, efficient, and scalable customer support—all while maintaining high service standards. By harnessing AI, they allow businesses to be agile and responsive, proving that sometimes, innovation comes in the form of a friendly virtual agent.
